name: exanOLD
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| wex(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wa(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| wex(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wa(w0, w1))

|- wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wa(w0, w1))
-| wa(wex(s0, w0), w1)

|- wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| wa(wex(s0, w0), w1)
-| w1

|- wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| wa(wex(s0, w0), w1)

comment: Obsolete proof of ~ exan as of 19-Jun-2023. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1993.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 13-Jan-2018.) Reduce axiom dependencies. (Revised by BJ, 7-Jul-2021.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 6-Nov-2022.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
